overview: Everybody loves a cute, sexy, bookish nerdy girl. William H. brings you an entire movie dedicated to these demure bespectacled stars. Featuring Karlie Montana in a boy girl scene, as well as Jessie Andrews, Anikka Albrite, Allie Haze, and April O'Neil. Do not miss this creative outing from the award winning director, William H.
title: Nerdy Girls
